headline: GTA Online
subtitle: WORLD PREMIERES
content:
As you progress through the investigation to recover Dr. Dre’s stolen music, you’ll get to listen to exclusive world premieres of new songs by the legendary producer.

The story will also give you an inside look at Dr. Dre working his magic in the new Record A Studios, where you can grab a drink, kick back, and even watch Dr. Dre perform with a special guest.
